hub.hero_subtitle: Discover who you are, what you can do, and what the world is waiting for with our "500% Elite" tools.

bigfive.title: Your Big Five Profile
bigfive.subtitle: Below you can see how you score on the five dimensions.

traits.openness: Openness to experience, intellectual curiosity, and creativity.
traits.extraversion: Extraversion, energy from social situations, assertiveness, and enthusiasm.
traits.agreeableness: Agreeableness, compassion, cooperation, and trust in others.
traits.neuroticism: Sensitivity to stress and negative emotions (versus emotional stability).

questions.1: I am the life of the party.
questions.2: I feel little concern for others.
questions.8: I leave my belongings lying around.
questions.10: I have difficulty with abstract ideas.

riasec.title: Your Holland Code
riasec.subtitle: Based on your choices, these work environments suit you best.

descriptions.realistic: You like practical work, working with your hands, tools, or machines.
descriptions.investigative: You like analyzing, researching, and solving complex problems.
descriptions.artistic: You are creative, expressive, and like designing or art.
descriptions.social: You enjoy working with people, helping them, and contributing to their development.
descriptions.enterprising: You like taking the lead, selling ideas, and being ambitious.
descriptions.conventional: You work in an organized, accurate way and like clear structures.

explorer.empty_state: No studies found matching your criteria.
explorer.swipe_msg: Didn't see any studies you liked? Try adjusting your filters.

coach.title: AI Career Coach
coach.subtitle: Powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash
coach.welcome: Hi! I am your personal AI study coach. How can I help you with your study choice?
coach.footer: VWO Elite AI makes mistakes. Check important info.
coach.error_offline: Sorry, I cannot connect to the server right now.
coach.proactive_single: Hey, I saw you are interested in {{studies}}. What appeals to you most about it?
coach.proactive_multi: I see you are doubting between e.g. {{studies}}. Shall we list the differences?
